classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, C3, C4, C1-C5 elective, D1, D2, D3, D4 and D5. C4 and D5 should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
